website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for buyers needing a high-quality pogo jumper to support both children and adults.
pros: Great for children of all sizes and adults up to 250 pounds
Built-in squeaker at bottom of pogo base
Foam handles and base offer safety and comfort to users
cons: A few customers noticed problems with the durability of the built-in squeaker

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my 4 year old nephew and he LOVED it! I didn't know this but it squeaks ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old nephew and he LOVED it! I didn't know this but it squeaks when being jumped on. I didn't care for the squeaking but when an older/bigger child jumped on it the squeaker part quit working (YAYY!!!) Also, it really is the proper height for a smaller kiddo...will be too small for an 7+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: The kids had tons of fun for 2.5 months. However, one of the yellow tubes has holes starting in it. It’s only a matter of time before it tears off. BE CAREFUL. My children are only ranging from 30-45 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCrary

customer_reviews.title: Very funny!
customer_reviews.text: If only you could see how funny it was when I got on it to demostrate to the the 5 year olds. They did better than I. Some could stay on a long time and others were falling. We had a good time and a lot of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Snedecor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a group of kids I spend one day a month with and they absolutely LOVE it! Ranging in ages from 2-1/2 and 7, the eight children left all other toys by the wayside and jumped on these all day. Using the older kids words, they said, "How do you do it?! You give us the most awesomest gifts!" I have to say I felt like a Rockstar :D
customer_reviews.author: savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  Get a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute idea. Purchased this one for my daughter and a different brand for my son. It was a Christmas gift (she hasn’t even had it for 3 weeks) and the squeaker doesn’t work anymore. The other brand works perfectly fine. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: SO AWESOME for kids AND adults!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece who just turned 4. It was such a hit! I love that it can hold up to 250 lbs; so not only did my niece get to play - - but auntie, uncle, mom & dad all tried it out too & let me just say - my niece almost got more of a kick out of watching the grown-ups play on a pogo stick than doing it herself. But she does love it & plans to practice everyday so she can jump as many times as we did:)
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Irvin

customer_reviews.title: The kiddos from ages 4 to 11 enjoyed it and had fun counting how many times they ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our grandchildren and were privileged to watch them play with this pogo jumper. The kiddos from ages 4 to 11 enjoyed it and had fun counting how many times they could jump. The especially nice thing was that when they jumped in the house, it was quiet and things did not rattle as they took turns jumping. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive photo
customer_reviews.text: The photo is deceptive. The handle is attached to a rubber tube that does not straighten. The platform foot space is very small, even for a 3yo. Not an easy toy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Donna-Mom

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Great excersize!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. this one is shorter than the pink one and better for younger kids. We ordered both and then saw the Hight difference. The red one is 2.5" and the pink one is 3.5" tall. We then ordered another red one and hid the pink one. Just worried about twisted ankles with the larger pink one. They get to bouncing and squeaking and you can't help but laugh! Much better than just starring at a screen!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Logger Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I tried it myself and have to admit it was fun! I shall see if it can withhold the ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet. I bought it for my second graders to use at recess. I tried it myself and have to admit it was fun! I shall see if it can withhold the frequent use of 7 year olds. The yellow "pole" in the center is made of rubber so it does not stand upright as shown. The child has to pull up on the handles as they jump. This makes it easier to store. It is very lightweight and will be great for bringing back and forth from recess. It will definitely help to develop gross motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Gelineau

customer_reviews.title: That the middle part is not stiff
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find that the middle was not stiff, as to old onto while the kids were jumping on it. I was thinking more of a stationary pogo stick. It feels sturdy and I think it would be fun but for a 4 and 5 year old I can see them swinging it around at each other.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: smaller than envisioned
customer_reviews.text: didn't realize that the pole part was like a large rubber band and not a solid pole. Smaller than I thought it would be, but fun for a small child who can figure out how to pull up on the handle while jumping. Not great for smaller kids who can't pull up on it and jump at the same time. Frustrating for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Busscher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic choice for active indoor play
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo grandson absolutely loved this toy. It's so great because there's nothing about it that will hurt the floor or other inside features and it's up and down power is provided solely by the child's legs, so there's nothing augmenting the child's jumping to cause things to get out of control.
customer_reviews.author: England

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful energy burning toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: This product looks perfect for my 4 and 6 year old grandsons. And they were! The boys bounce race each other, and just enjoy bouncing on them. They have been played with alot already and are holding up really well. I would highly recommend them for any child who likes to play physically.
customer_reviews.author: wendy norman

customer_reviews.title: Great way to burn energy inside on a rainy day
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-old grandson absolutely loves this! I have to admit that I like it too, he can jump on it in the house on rainy days. It’s an awesome way to get out some of that energy! I highly recommend it and would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: When my six-year-old grandson open the package he immediately got on it and started jumping around the house. He absolutely loved it and was able to jump very easily with no problem at all. After he jumped a few trips around the house, he eagerly shared it with the adults who seem to have just as much fun with it. We all had a good laugh and a really fun time with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our 3-year-old grandson really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: An adult had to show him how to do it at first, but it's nice that an adult can do that.
customer_reviews.author: gcolvard

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for kids at our family reunion. They all enjoyed playing, jumping with it. Had some grown ups even try it. Brought back memories of the old fashion metal pogo sticks! We had a lot of good laughs 😂 watching the adults trying to be kids. Luckily no one required ER visit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for a 3 year old boy's birthday. He loved it more than his new bike! It was so fun! Then I decided to buy one for a 5 year old girl and she loved it too! They seem to work pretty well, especially for $10!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: his 5 yr old brother had to try it out to see if it would be good for brother
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 2 yr old grandson, his 5 yr old brother had to try it out to see if it would be good for brother. He loved it so I bought a 2nd one for their bday both in nov on the same day
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Bullock

customer_reviews.title: hour of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this Pogo, but was disappointed when the squeaker busted after 1 day! Pogo is still fun, and the rest has held up well--as long as your kid doesn't care about the fun squeaker!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Fun and lasts
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yr old grandchild got the first one of these and my now 4 y old grandchild is using the same one which was handed down. So it does last. I bought this one as a gift for a nieces child.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my great niece (a very active girl) today for her 4th birthday, I have her in my in-home daycare. She absolutely loved it, it took her about 10 minutes of practice to keep her balance. I think it will help with how active she is. She repeatedly told me how much she loved it. Little do her parents know that it makes squeaking noises! Lol After her reaction, I ordered one for my 3 1/2 year old grandson, can't wait to give it to him.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a pogo stick for a younger child
customer_reviews.text: We have a pogo stick, but my 3 year old son can't do it on his own. We have to balance him and bounce him and it's not really fun for anyone... This product is a great alternative! He loves that he can do it on his own. The squeaking sound is a perfect touch. This definitely holds his attention long enough to warrant the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kmcginley

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids and mother-in-law love this! The kids laugh as they jump around the place. Great grandma even had to try it. She is a tiny women. Wish it didn't make a noise, not all kids like things with noise. But it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Great Kid Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift for a child and even an adult. You can jump on it up to 250 lbs. It works perfectly. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R. Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Useful and fun for a 3 yr old
customer_reviews.text: As always arrived super quick. This product is amazing especially for a 3 yr old he jumps by his brother on his pogo stick makes me comfortable knowing he's safe doing it next to him and on his own. Love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Allen Potter

customer_reviews.title: my nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew, he is 2 1/2, he can balance on it but not quite jump on his own yet however auntie is here to help him learn. He loves this toy. he loves how it squeaks when he jumps. its made really well and I wish I had one when I was little.
customer_reviews.author: stace413

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pogo
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren used the item but quickly lost interest. It is good to help with their coordination but the attention span of a 4 year old is pretty fleeting.
customer_reviews.author: CherylB

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift order
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and was packaged well. However, it's being given as a gift next weekend so I haven't actually tried it. I'm sure it'll be well-received, though. What kid doesn't like pogo sticks?
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my girlfriends son and he was really enjoying but the sound to it seemed to go away less than a week of having it and it’s not like they were wearing it out, but that would be the only complaint I have about this toy
customer_reviews.author: Velvethoop

customer_reviews.title: Fun to jump
customer_reviews.text: 3 yo grandson had tons of fun easy to use and he could. Both 2 yo could not work it yet but hopefully they will. I like that it’s a physical activity.
customer_reviews.author: Diana K.Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my daughter and to my friends kids as gifts for them, they all love them and enjoy with it.. And this is steady too, so no difficulty in balancing for little kids. I would prefer to buy again if any of friends' kids have birthday or any occasion to gift them
customer_reviews.author: Giri Uppin

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to buy two
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this product. I purchased for my 4 year old for the holidays and it's been well loved indoors and out by my kids and neighbors. After cousins visited and enjoyed this as well, it was gifted to a three year old and now is getting use by their friends as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Erica MT

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Since we are stuck at home I got this to get the kids some inside exercise and boy did I make the right choice! They love it. Very easy to use and they were hopping around the house sweating and out of breath in no time! And because of the big bottom it's super easy to use which is less stress and more fun for the kids. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: cl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Almost 3 year old enjoyed it and also used as a "vacuum"! : )
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandson for his 5 year old birthday. He loves it! He has to work at it a little, but has such a good time trying. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little cheap when first opened. Worked better than I would have thought. Our grandson can play with this inside or out. The band is a little short, so more for younger kids- maybe under 5.
customer_reviews.author: lorna

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor toy
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pogo jumper I have purchased. My grandsons, ages 6 and 4 love theirs and I needed to get another for their cousin. They are sturdy enough for a parent to use with a younger child or someone learning, and the don’t go high enough for anyone to get seriously injured if they fall. They are easy to use and have are very sturdy. My grandsons have used them for over a year and they are as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth C. Mountain

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves jumping on this. Great for getting some energy out when we are cooped up inside bc of weather. So far it seems super durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: So fun, wish they had this when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 on durability as I'm not sure yet. BUT as the primary person playing with it I can see that it is strong. My 2 year old isn't quite ready for hopping fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Hit of a Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit of my 4 year old's birthday!! He jumped all night and wouldn't even put it down, much to the sorrow of my other four kids who were dying to use it, too. Great toy that has held up to all of us (my husband and me included) taking our turns in the weeks since. Definitely a great buy for my happy, active kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to stay on. Something is off..... My daughter was jumping on different one no problem. Got this one, used it few times.... It's been laying in the corner for weeks
customer_reviews.author: InventiveGraphics

customer_reviews.title: a must for winter time
customer_reviews.text: I got this on lightening deal. I thought it would be great for the kids to get some energy out in the house in the middle of winter. My 3 year old needs help with it but my 5 year old can do it by her self. They use it all the time. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Barnicle

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas gift for my five-year-old granddaughter she has so much fun with it indoors and out perfect gift for 5 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Erika S

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my 3 year old nephew and he was obsessed! He is very rambunctious and he kept jumping purely cos he liked the squeak noise haha! Great little gift for active kids :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: FUN1
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 grandkids for Christmas, they LOVED it. The 2 year old got the hang of it very quickly, her 7 yrs old brother took a little longer. Great exercise for them.
customer_reviews.author: Chicks

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos absolutely love this toy! We've shared the link with a few friends who in turn purchased for their kiddos and are loving it. Great toy, colorful, durable and just fun.
customer_reviews.author: Redwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for her birthday and she loves it. She can jump around the house and I don't have to worry about her breaking anything. It makes a little squeaking noise which is cute. She loves this and it's a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids could not figure out how to use these. Maybe they are too young
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't have bought it if it had been an amazing sale. Sorry
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay alternative to a pogo stick. Yes, adults can jump on it too. One positive point is that you CAN jump on it indoors.Just not what I expected. I wouldn't have bought it if it had been an amazing sale. Sorry, just not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift for my niece and she absolutely loves it !!!!!! i would not hesitate to get another one! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: LInda White

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The three year old loves this! Easy for him to learn and use. A safe (and cheap) toy that would make a fun gift for any kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Spaacekase

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy-Tough-Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Bought it for my 4 year old grandson but by the end of the party all of his 7-12 siblings and cousins were bouncing all over. It’s so light but tough and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old birthday. She likes it and will keep her away from the TV :)
customer_reviews.author: varsync

customer_reviews.title: Pogo play
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an outdoor play toy. Both boys are very ruff and play hard. I’m hoping that they hold up this coming summer
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Takes up littles space , it's durable and soft for inside use. love the squeak it makes funny kids love it and they can use it inside
customer_reviews.author: Ozark guy

customer_reviews.title: Safe and great indoors and outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Love the pogo stick. I took a hop or two on it when it arrived. Giving to my grandsons for Christmas so our holiday will be hopping. Well-made and much safer than the metal socks I hopped on as a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for active kid
customer_reviews.text: Looks well built. Hopefully it should last for a year or two. So far kid and my are happy!
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased them for a Christmas gift so I can only review from the looks of it!
customer_reviews.author: Malia K. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for inside summer fun for my 4 yr old grandbaby, instead of outside in the heat...she absolutely loves it and it brings such joy to me to see her so happy bouncing around
customer_reviews.author: Edith Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it even adults. Kids loved the sound it makes when they would come down from hopping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old grandson loved this.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as an outdoor alternative and as an attempt to burn some energy since it's been snowy and cold outside. It was a challenge for him at first to jump hard enough to get it to squeak. He was very proud of himself once he did it. Made very well and I like that it is not damaging in any way when used indoors. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Fun product but possibly faulty squeaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids for an Easter gift. They really like it and it’s fun but the squeaker stopped working already and they’ve only had it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pogo magic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an active six year old He’s loving it. Greatwaytousesome excess energy
customer_reviews.author: nancy herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toys for preschoolers. They have held up well. I have purchased five and they are played with by a number of children. The squeeker is an added bonus. I highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: library lynn

customer_reviews.title: It's a good indoor safe toy I can use when Texas summer days are too hot to go outside.
customer_reviews.text: All my 4 kids ages 3-12 can use it and like it. I ordered a second one for races.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Got multiple gifts and it was the one he liked the best and played with all afternoon
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old grandson loves it. Got multiple gifts and it was the one he liked the best and played with all afternoon. Absolutely a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: carol miller

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Opened to try out first. Really fun for any age even adults !
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Safe alternative to a pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 year old to jump around in the house. The handle is stretchy so will grow with him a little.
customer_reviews.author: kab

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 as Christmas gifts for my great niece and nephews
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 as Christmas gifts for my great niece and nephews,ages 3,5,8. Big hit with them all. Reasonable price and fosters activity instead of sedentary tech toys. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Pmcg

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for separate gifts and it is always a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Martir

customer_reviews.title: but everyone will be able to use and enjoy this pogo jumper
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to 3 preschool friends, and it was generally, very popular. It is developmentally more appropriate for 3 year olds, rather than 2 year olds, but everyone will be able to use and enjoy this pogo jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected hit! I didn’t expect the entire family to go crazy with it haha. We had everyone waiting in line for their turn.. kids and adults alike
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This toy is fabulous. It was s big hit for several ages
customer_reviews.author: Jan Eby

customer_reviews.title: Bought for grandson and he said it was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to get our grandson something he would enjoy. This was a winner. He loved it and we are happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Killinger-Humes

customer_reviews.title: Basically soft foam rubber and plastic and rubber bands.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a rinky dink toy. Not what I expected. It’s Basically soft foam rubber and plastic and large rubber bands.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: It may not hold up for a long time as the vinyl hose could tear..but it's a hit with the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great toy for an active little one
customer_reviews.text: My 18th month old nephew started playing with it immediately and it entertained him for quite awhile. It is a great toy for an active little one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: Super fun toy, great for days stuck inside, doesn’t hurt hardwoods and works on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Wow What a Find

customer_reviews.title: Good for gifting
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a 5 year old boy, keeps them busy outside and a good alternative to a bike or scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kochones

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 and 5 year old love it, it took a little time to get used to, but they enjoyed it once they did.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bordner

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensory needs!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 for my classroom and my students love it!! I teach a K-2 Special Education class and several of my students have sensory needs. The Play22 Foam Pogo Jumpers are a great way for them to get their energy out inside the classroom!!!! Great reinforcers as well for positive and appropriate behavior!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: This thing  squeaks.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, the only reason I took off a star was for the annoying squeak. Good quality product, seems to be holding up to their use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: HUGE HIT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's 5th birthday and he LOVED it! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MsSuzie

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time as promised and my grandson loves it! He got so excited when he opened it on Christmas. Took it out of the box and started using our right away. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C2 Review

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Super durable - works indoors or out. Can work for any aged “kid”..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for so many ages and witheld bouncing and tugging from a 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: I believe this will hold up well for extended use. I gave it as a birthday present to a 4 year old and at the party, a 10 year old played it vigorously. All the kids present loved the squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much since the price was so cheap. It definitely exceeded my expectations! My 4 yo loves it and it was easy for her to figure out
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Issac Koch

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter having a good time with the pogo stick.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr. old granddaughter had such fun on her birthday trying out the pogo stick. I even gave it a try I am 61 years maybe old so it fits all ages lol.
customer_reviews.author: littchp

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this, and I don't mind if they use in the house. The noise it makes is like a dog toy
customer_reviews.author: Linda Springer

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong -  fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo niece AND her 5 yo brother AND 9 yo sister all loved it. The squeaking noise got a little annoying but it was so cute seeing the youngest get better and better as she practiced.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 year old grandson's birthday. The whole family ended up giving it a try and had a lot of fun. Our grandson and his sister both love it. It was a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to use it, I could not do it and my 3 y old either! Hi
customer_reviews.author: Bozenna

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons ages 3 and 6 love this pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons ages 3 and 6 love this pogo stick! This is a great toy that can be enjoyed indoor or outside. It gets the kids away from the TV and video games.
customer_reviews.author: Robin D.

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten Favorite
customer_reviews.text: The children in my Kindergarten class love these. I will need to order more than the two that I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Lola A Sapp

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, and it's great indoor exercise for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Even two year old can jump on it a couple times. Got this for $10 and worth it!

customer_reviews.title: My three year old great grand son hopped on & took off
customer_reviews.text: The Pogo jumper for kids was a huge hit. My three year old great grand son hopped on & took off. The other kids had their turn. Much fun for all.
customer_reviews.author: Nelda Bensley
